tbl.now 0.1.0
  • Reference

Tibble now (tbl.now)

The goal of tbl.now is to provide a unified tibble-like interface for nowcasting algorithms within the diseasenowcasting framework.

Installation

You can install the development version of tbl.now from GitHub with:

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github"RodrigoZepeda/tbl.now")
